traits.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second  Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Drannin wears a control amulet for his shield guardian (see the Monster Manual) and a ring of cold resistance. He also carries a potion of frost giant strength.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Drannin makes three attacks with his greataxe.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.
